Job Posting:175541 - Position: W26 Fraud Analyst Intern 175541B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Winter App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 11/26/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 11/19/2025 01:33 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization City Province / State Country Super.com Toronto ON Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Salary Range $ Job Description About Super.com 2026 - Winter W26 Fraud Analyst Intern 175541B Co-op Position Remote Canada 4 months Fully Remote CAD Salary Not Available, 40 Major List $23.50 - $29 an hour We started Super.com to help maximize lives-both the lives of our customers and the lives of our employees- so that everyone can experience all that life has to offer. For our employees, our promise is that Super.com is more than just a job; it's an opportunity to unlock one's potential, where learning is celebrated and impact is realized. We are more than a fast-paced, high-growth tech company; we care about our people and take career progression seriously. This is your career and our aim is to supercharge it through the people, the work, and the programs that fuel who we are. About this Role This is a great opportunity to gain meaningful, hands-on experience in fraud operations through the Winter 2026 term. As a part of the broader Strategic Operations team, you will learn how the business works and have a direct impact on the customer experience. There will be opportunities to assist special projects. This internship is a good fit for a student with foundational business knowledge, excellent attention to detail, and a passion for working with people! Challenges You'll Solve Review customer accounts in order to compile compelling evidence for customer disputes • • Assess data to gather insights on customer behavior and identify opportunities • Monitor Fraud Dashboards to ensure we're being proactive in our fraud mitigation efforts • Opportunity to participate in special projects related to fraud and chargebacks We've got you covered Compensation: we pay our Interns top-of-market • • $300 One-time home office set up allowance • $25/Week UberEats allowance on Fridays • $300/Term Learning and Development allowance • $120/ Term Fitness/Wellness allowance • Top Talent: work with the best in the world, including Engineers and Leadership from Google, Facebook, Wish, YouTube, Uber and more • Build Something Great: most importantly, build a product used by millions around the world - have ownership, have impact, and do great work $23.50 - $29 an hour Compensation for this internship will be determined based on the number of prior work terms or internships you have successfully completed, in alignment with our intern pay structure. We Believe in Equal Opportunity We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. Accommodations are available on request for candidates taking part in all aspects of the selection process. If needed, please notify our Talent Acquisition Partner. We Believe in Equal Opportunity We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. Accommodations are available on request for candidates taking part in all aspects of the selection process. If needed, please notify our Talent Acquisition Partner. Job Requirements About You You are a post-secondary student, studying business or finance • • Proficiency with Microsoft Excel • 1-2 work terms/internships successfully completed • Experience with data analysis preferred • You have a passion for people, processes, and systems • You have a strong work ethic with a desire to contribute to a fast-growing startup • You are a critical thinker and problem-solver You have the ability to learn quickly, paired with the desire to work hard • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://jobs.lever.co/super-com/9d858451-ce9e-4381-bc17-bec50bf51db0 Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
